A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was looking forward to this since Rogue one. I am not the pickiest fan. I loved OT\, I liked prequals\, I really liked TFA and I loved Rogue one.\nI rewatched twice\, and I will never ever torture myself with this awful\, stupid\, cringy crap that is unbelievable. I seriously sitting through\, yes I wasn't watching this\, I was sitting through\, at one moment thought this is just a bad joke.
